name: orientation
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: orientation
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the particular things that a person prefers, believes, thinks, or usually does
trans_examp.trans_cn: （某人的）特别喜好，价值取向，信仰观念

example.eg: We employ people without regard to their political or sexual orientation.
example.egtrans: 我们雇用人时并不考虑其政治或性取向。

dsense.name: orientation
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the particular interests, activities, or aims of an organization or business

example.egtrans: 公司保护生态环境的新定位

dsense.name: orientation
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: training or preparation for a new job or activity
trans_examp.trans_cn: （对新工作、新活动的）培训，准备

example.eg: The department has arranged an orientation session.
example.egtrans: 这个部门安排了一次岗前培训。

dsense.name: orientation
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: The building has an east-west orientation (= it is built on a line between east and west).
